name: dxfeed-pusher
description: SEDA DataRequest scheduler - Generic oracle data pusher for SEDA network

scripts.test:all: bun test && bun run tests/test-seda-config.ts && bun run tests/test-datarequest.ts
scripts.build:binary: bun run build:bundle && bun build dist/bundle.js --compile --outfile dist/seda-pusher
scripts.build:optimized: bun build src/runner.ts --target=bun --minify --outfile dist/bundle-min.js && bun build dist/bundle-min.js --compile --outfile dist/seda-pusher-optimized
